testcase.name: Admin can create new test item
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped Then Admin should see the required fields for creating or updating test items.skipped When Admin fill in the necessary fields to create a new test item...........skipped And Admin save the new test item............................................skipped Then Admin should see the new test item added to the list of test items.....skipped

testcase.name: Admin can view test items
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped Then Admin should see all the created test items displayed on the page......skipped

testcase.name: Admin can delete test item
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped And Admin have at least one test item created...............................skipped And Admin select the test item that needs to be deleted.....................skipped And Admin confirm the deletion..............................................skipped Then Admin should see the test item is no longer displayed on the test items page.skipped

testcase.name: Validate test item API endpoints
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped Given Admin have an API testing tool........................................skipped When Admin send API requests for creating, viewing, and deleting test items.skipped Then Admin should receive the expected status codes and data in the API responses.skipped

testcase.name: Admin can create test item using API
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped Given Admin have an API testing tool........................................skipped When Admin send a POST request for creating a new test item.................skipped Then Admin should see the new test item is created successfully.............skipped And the API response contains the correct details of the created test item..skipped

testcase.name: Verify test items in database
testcase.system-out: Given Admin is logged in as an admin user...................................undefined When Admin navigate to the create test item page............................skipped Given Admin have a database querying tool...................................skipped When Admin query the database for the test items............................skipped Then Admin should see the data in the database matches the expected values for the created test items.skipped
